sources.title: Hungry Hoboes (1928)
sources.description: Oswald and his friend and nemesis Peg-Leg Pete are hobos riding on a train and playing checkers when hilarity ensues Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hungry-hoboes-1928/

metadata.Plot: The film follows the misadventures of Oswald and his roughneck pal, Putrid Pete, as they ride a freight car loaded with animals and devise ways to cook a meal using the tools at hand. When a policeman chases them off the train, the duo poses as a hurdy-gurdy man and a monkey as part of their escape.
